attributes.action: Demand that train companies sell tickets guaranteeing a seat rather than just the right to travel on the train
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would stop train companies overselling tickets - where customers exceed capacity on the train - and create a situation as with airlines, where a ticket equals a seat. Forcing people to stand for their journey when the train is overcrowded is stressful and unsafe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
